title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 327.7 - Other chemicals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 327.7 - Other chemicals

State Regulations

In addition to the authorized chemicals and specifications, permits may be issued for other chemicals and specifications, without the
necessity of adding them to the list, when it is evident that their use will
conform with the intent and purpose of the law and these regulations. Only
chemicals labeled for the intended use, registered in the State of New York and
not in conflict with the regulations relating to restricted use pesticides may
be authorized for use pursuant to this section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
327.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
